/** * An image for a graph * * @package Artichow */

/** * Get driver of the image * * @param int $w Driver width (from 0 to 1) (default to 1) * @param int $h Driver height (from 0 to 1) (default to 1) * @param float $x Position on X axis of the center of the driver (default to 0.5) * @param float $y Position on Y axis of the center of the driver (default to 0.5) * @return Driver */
/** * Sets the driver that will be used to draw the graph * * @param string $driverString */
/** * Change the image size * * @var int $width Image width * @var int $height Image height */
/** * Return image background, whether a Color or a Gradient * * @return mixed */
/** * Turn antialiasing on or off * * @var bool $bool */
/** * Change image format * * @var int $format New image format */
/** * Returns the image format as an integer * * @return unknown */
/** * Returns the image format as a string * * @return string */
/** * Select the correct driver * * @param string $driver The desired driver * @return mixed */
// We should never get here, unless the wrong string is used AND the ARTICHOW_DRIVER
// We should never get here, unless the wrong string is used AND the ARTICHOW_DRIVER
/** * Draw a component on the image * * @var awComponent $component A component */
/** * Send the image into a file or to the user browser * */
/** * Return the image content as binary data * */
/** * Send the correct HTTP header according to the image type * */
/* * Display an error image and exit * * @param string $message Error message */
/* * Display an error image located in a file and exit * * @param string $error Error name */
/** * An image for a graph * * @package Artichow */
/** * Load an image from a file * * @package Artichow */
/** * Build a new awimage * * @param string $file Image file name */
/** * Load an image from a file * * @package Artichow */
